item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Valve releases Team Fortress 2 game code (509 points | 137 comments)
2. My LLM codegen workflow (148 points | 28 comments)
3. Nuclear fusion: WEST beats the world record for plasma duration (175 points | 116 comments)

28. Open-Sourcing R1 1776 (25 points | 3 comments)
29. Svelte 5 is not JavaScript (136 points | 156 comments)
30. OpenAI Announces New SWE-Lancer Benchmark (15 points | 4 comments)
